item.description:
Because we are a F*U*N group of people who like to socialize as well as skunking people in Cribbage, especially Micki :) If you like playing cribbage/cards and enjoy people, then COME ON DOWN TO THIS MEET UP ! ! !

Just met Larry, who never played cribbage before, and won the game he was playing with 2 people who have been playing a very long time :) :) :) Good for you Larry and hope you come back to beat the rest of us (ya, sure, like that would happen to ME).

Sue it was great to see you and enjoyed being beaten by your Mom and Bro and then having them catch me in one hand not counting all my points (OMG) you won't be bringing them again soon, will ya? Honest they were great and your Mom really knew her stuff. Come on down again and soon :)

Susan, just because Emad won't be here for the next 3 meet ups :( :( :( we still want you here to enjoy us :) Laura enjoy your vacation

But on another note, the food is great, the people are friendly and then we played Texas Hold 'Em. Verrrrry interesting, hmmmmm!! as Joe brought his chips and I, Micki, walked away with most of them intact or 'in' someplace :) Inside joke...
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back room with our cribbage boards out :)
item.name: Waltham Cribbage Meet Up for Summer (is it here yet?)
